mapper.sql:
FROM ctClass WHERE 1=1
AND ctcsDelNy = 1 AND ctcsDelNy = 0
AND ctcsName LIKE concat('%',#{shCtcsName},'%')
AND ctcsName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ctcsId LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
AND regDateTime BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd} AND modDateTime BETWEEN #{shDateStart} AND #{shDateEnd}
mapper.select:
select ctcmName from ctClassMember
where 1=1 and ctcmSeq = #{ctcmSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ctClassMember WHERE 1=1 AND ctcmSeq = #{ctcmSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE ctClass SET ctcsDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND ctcsSeq = #{ctcsSeq}
UPDATE ctClass SET ctcsDelny = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND ctcsSeq = #{ctcsSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT a.ctcsSeq ,a.ctcsYear ,a.ctcsName ,b.ctcmSeq ,b.ctcmName ,b.ctcmTeacherNy FROM ctClass a LEFT JOIN ctClassMember b on b.ctcsSeq = a.ctcsSeq WHERE 1=1 AND b.ctcsSeq = #{ctcsSeq} AND b.mmSeq = #{mmSeq}
select ctcsCode from ctClass where 1=1 and ctcsSeq = #{ctcsSeq}

SELECT a.ctptSeq ,a.ctptTitle ,a.ctptWriter ,a.ctptContent ,a.regDateTime ,a.ctptReservationTypeCd ,a.ctptLike1 ,a.ctptLike2 ,a.ctptLike3 ,a.ctptView ,b.ctboTypeCd FROM ctPost a LEFT JOIN ctBoard b on b.ctboSeq = a.ctboSeq WHERE 1=1 AND b.ctcsSeq = #{ctcsSeq} ORDER BY a.regDateTime
select ctptSeq ,ctptTitle ,ctptWriter ,ctptContent ,regDateTime ,ctptLike1 ,ctptLike2 ,ctptLike3 ,ctboSeq ,ctptView from ctPost where 1=1 and ctptSeq = #{ctptSeq}

SELECT a.cthpSeq ,a.cthpTitle ,a.cthpWriter ,a.cthpDesc ,a.cthpData ,a.cthpEndDateTime ,a.cthpUseNy ,a.cthpDelNy ,a.regDateTime ,b.cthwSeq FROM ctHomeworkPost a LEFT JOIN ctHomework b on b.cthwSeq = a.cthwSeq WHERE 1=1 AND b.ctcsSeq = #{ctcsSeq}
select cthpSeq ,cthpTitle ,cthpWriter ,cthpDesc ,cthpData ,cthpEndDateTime ,cthpUseNy ,cthpDelNy ,regDateTime from ctHomeworkPost where 1=1 and cthpSeq = #{cthpSeq}
SELECT a.ctcmSeq ,a.ctcmName ,a.ctcmTeacherNy ,a.ctcsSeq FROM ctClassMember a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ctcsSeq = #{ctcsSeq}

SELECT a.ctptSeq ,a.ctptTitle ,a.ctptWriter ,a.ctptReservation ,a.ctptContent ,a.ctptReservationTypeCd ,a.regDateTime ,a.ctboSeq ,b.ctboTypeCd FROM ctPost a LEFT JOIN ctBoard b on b.ctboSeq = a.ctboSeq LEFT JOIN ctClassMember c on c.ctcmSeq = a.ctptWriter WHERE 1=1 AND a.ctboSeq = 4 AND b.ctcsSeq = #{ctcsSeq}
SELECT a.ctrpSeq ,a.ctrpContent ,a.ctrpWriter ,a.ctrpWriter ,a.regDateTime ,a.ctptSeq FROM ctReply a LEFT JOIN ctPost b on b.ctptSeq = a.ctptSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.ctptSeq = #{ctptSeq}
